244331.「ありがとう ありがとう デスマスターさん。\n これで ようやく 天に昇れます:
Thank you, thank you, Death Master. Now I can
finally ascend to the heavens... *sniffle*

244333.「えへへ～ 仕事してる デスマスターを\n 見てみたくて 追いかけてきちゃった。:
Ehehe～ I had to come out here to see a
Death Master at work.

244334.「あ～ でも ひと足 遅かったみたい？\n お弔いは すんじゃったようだけど\n:
Ah～, but looks like I was a little late. I
guess the mourning's already over, but I'll
offer up some prayers too.

244335.「見ず知らずの ぼくなんかのために\n ありがとうございます……しくしく。:
Thank you for doing something like this for
me, a total stranger... *sniffle*

244336.「こちらが 見えてないようなので\n 直接 お礼を言えなくて 心苦しい……。\n:
I'm sorry that I can't thank you myself, since
it seems you can't see me... Please forgive my
rudeness as I pass on.

244337.「幽霊さん アタシにも感謝してくれたの！？\n 霊界通話機の声は 聞こえたんだけ:
The ghost wanted to thank me!? I could hear
their voice on the spirit world caller, but I
guess I can't hear them in person.

244338.「でも くじけない！ アタシのご先祖サマは\n デスマスターなんだもん。アタシの:
But I'm not giving up! My parents were both
Death Masters. My spiritual senses must still
be dormant!

244339.「えっ！？ どしたの！\n なんか出てきた？ ひょっとして 幽霊？:
What!? What is it? Is there something there?
Is it another ghost?

244342.「……変なオバケが アタシに向かって 継承者？:
...A weird ghost was staring at me, calling me
an heir?

244343.「継承 継承……遺産の継承とか？\n じつは アタシには 本当の両親がいて\n:
Heir, heir... you mean like an inheritor?
Could it be that I was adopted, and my real
parents left me a massive inheritance!?

244345.「考えても しゃあないし\n デズ師匠んちに 帰ろっか。:
No point worrying about it, so let's go back
to Master Dezzie's place.

252078.「ハズレ！ ハズレ！\n 継承者ニ アラズ。継承者ニ アラズ。:
WRONG! WRONG!
HEIR NOT HERE. HEIR NOT HERE.
